description: Starting from the access road to the old ski hill, nice light sections with some sections where the provided ropes are appreciated.  A couple of scrambly ravines, stopped us from getting to the top because of rain and fog, made it slick.Has a nice view of Port Alberni.
directions: Drive from Nanaimo towards Port Alberni, until you come to Cathedral Grove, aka MacMillan Provincial Park. From there drive 8.6km further and turn left onto a logging road Follow this road. At 2.7 km the road will meet another one. Turn right. 7.3 km further you will cross the Cameron River. Half a km further take the left turn. This road will switchback up the mountain until you come to the GPS trailhead.
title: Mount Arrrowsmith - Saddle Route
